EmailTemplates.ClaimApprovedBody:
Dear {CustomerName},

Your claim with ID {ClaimId} has been approved. Check you claim on the website to download the authorization document.

Thank you for trusting us.
EmailTemplates.ClaimEscalatedBody:
Dear {CustomerName},

Your claim with ID {ClaimId} has been escalated for further manual review. We will update you as soon as a decision is made.

Thank you for your patience.
EmailTemplates.ClaimRejectedBody:
Dear {CustomerName},

We regret to inform you that your claim with ID {ClaimId} has been rejected based on our evaluation.

If you have any questions, please contact our support team.
EmailTemplates.ClaimEscalationAssignedBody:
Hello {EmployeeName},

You have been assigned to manually evaluate claim {ClaimId} for customer {CustomerName}.

Please proceed in the system.
